author: Ross Mcdonagh For Dailymail.Com
title: Blac Chyna flaunts her curves in sexy Instagram | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share 'Its so comfy and my core and body frame Look & Feel amazing PLUS its discreet under any outfit,' she boasted, offering her 11.4million followers a 20 per cent discount. On Thursday, multiple sources for Us Weekly confirmed that the couple had ended their relationship once again. Gotta pay that rent: Despite having babies with both a rapper and reality star, the video vixen wasn't content to rely on the financial security that brings, using the clip to hawk a waist trainer Watch this: With Travis Scott and Kendrick Lamar's Goosebumps playing in the background, the model traces her hand around her voluptuous figure suggestively Tough times: The pair - pictured together in Hollywood back in May - have split again according to a Thursday report from Us Weekly Though the pair share a three-month-old daughter named Dream, their insider explained the only Kardashian brother understands the choice as he said: 'Rob thinks it's the right decision. 'Chyna has disappeared for days at a time without communicating or providing any updates. This won't end well.' A separate source for Us Weekly claims that the two have been not getting along since their first split around Christmas. The weekly's source added: '[It's the same] with her yelling and screaming about how his family doesn’t like or support her, and his insecurities.' 'This won't end well': A source for the weekly said the 29-year-old reality star and 28-year-old model have not been getting along since Chrismas, as they are pictured together at JFK Airport in New York City last month Bond: The two share a three-month-old daughter named Dream together Rob famously documented an empty home - including bare nursery - on his Snapchat around the holiday. This comes just a day after reports that the two had another major fight over the weekend as a source told Us Weekly : 'They are at it again!' The two have been living separately as Chyna moved back into her home and Rob lives in the Calabasas estate his mother Kris Jenner bought for him back in February of last year. The Rob & Chyna stars did not even spend Valentine's Day together as Rob took to his Instagram to post a photo of his 61-year-old mother holding his adorable baby daughter. 'She left me and she took the baby': Back in December Rob shared heartbreaking video of his empty house after Chyna fled with their new baby Dream Nobody home: In a number of Snapchat videos, the reality star made his way through the abandoned house, showing empty room after empty room including the nursery The mother-of-two, who also shares four-year-old King Cairo with ex Tyga, 27, faced speculation that her romance with the reality star is on the rocks when she was recently spotted out with another man. Last week Chyna was seen getting rather close to whom People magazine reported as Jamel Davenport at The MA Theatre in Los Angeles on Super Bowl Sunday. A source told Page Six that 'I would definitely have thought they were a couple if didn’t know better.' 'Stealing hearts mama': The engaged couple didn't even spend Valentine's Day together, as Rob shared the loving holiday with his baby girl and momager, Kris Jenner, 61 To hear the insider tell it, Chyna called herself 'faded' and told another guest at the viewing party that 'she’s still talking to Rob but they’re not living together right now.' It was also noted that the paid had gotten close and 'at some point had his hand in her lap or on her legs.' And on Friday, she was spotted again with Davenport as they dined together and she wasn't wearing her $325,000 seven-carat engagement ring. 'One of their main issues is that Rob doesn’t trust her,' a source told People. 'Even rumors of Chyna getting close to other guys, will cause another epic fight.' Missing bling: Chyna - pictured December 2016 - was spotted without her $325,000 seven-carat engagement ring as she dined with Jamel Davenport on Friday Chyna also seemingly threw shade at her reality star fiancé as she took to Snapchat earlier this month to vent her frustrations. 'It’s funny when people say they wanna be great but sleep until 3 p.m. etc,” she wrote, which seemed to be referring to her reality star fiancé. Rob and Chyna went public with their relationship in January 2016 and were quickly engaged in April. Just one month later the only Kardashian son and the Lashed owner announced they were expecting in May. Moving quick: Rob and Chyna went public with their relationship in January 2016 and were quickly engaged in April. They announced the pregnancy in May. Read more:
